AssetStatePeriodAttribute.name: AssetStatePeriodAttribute
AssetStatePeriodAttribute.description: Represents a virtual object that holds the key-value pair of the asset attribute in a specified asset state period. This object is a child object of AssetStatePeriod.

AssetStatePeriodId.description: The asset state period that's associated with the asset attribute.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: The attribute definition that's associated with the asset state period attribute.

AttributeName.description: The name of the asset attribute.

AttributePicklistValueId.description: The value specified in the picklist type field that corresponds to the attribute in the AttributePicklistValue object.

AttributeValue.description: The value of the asset state period attribute. For example, a shirt can have the value of blue, which indicates the shirt's color, or it can have the value of small, which indicates the shirt's size.
